'''The More the Merrier''' is [[Hu Tao]]'s [[Utility Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* If Hu Tao perfectly cooks [[Vegetarian Abalone]], she has a chance of producing both her special dish, [[Ghostly March]], and a Suspicious-quality Vegetarian Abalone.
